Comment 1: 
a semi-faq.
why all the extra type information that the compiler could infer?
because what looks simple in C turns out to have many special
cases, especially when you add named initializer positions and
array index positions.  rather than repeat the mistake, we chose
to keep expressions from depending on their context to be
type-checked.
